Type: Allocation of Resources Without Limits or Throttling
Description: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Allocation of Resources Without Limits or Throttling. An attacker can cause indefinite amounts of memory to be used by inputting a string of modest size. This can lead to a Denial of Service.
